meaning: एषः: Thisआत्मा: selfअपहतपाप्मा: free from sinविजरः: free from old ageविमृत्युः: free from deathविशोकः: free from sorrowविजिघत्सुः: free from hungerअपिपासः: free from thirstMeaning:This self is free from sin, old age, death, sorrow, hunger, and thirst.This verse highlights the qualities of the self, which is described as being free from various afflictions and limitations. It emphasizes the true nature of the self as being pure, immortal, free from suffering, and devoid of worldly desires. The verse suggests that the self is beyond the transient aspects of existence and possesses inherent qualities of purity and immortality.
